name: The Imposters
description:
How about another attack today? The Imposters is an indie - casual game in which you will fight alone.

As the main character , your mission will be to destroy all the imposters without being noticed by their sensors. You have to pass all the levels in order to win.

If they see you in their range, that means instant death. Therefore, do it in such a way that it is not known where the danger comes from. Everything is in your hands. Good luck hero!

Game Features :
- Alone against all
- Multiple levels
- As you pass through the levels, the difficulty will increase
